EmailTemplate.name: MX 2017 - Summer Leads - Staff Flight
EmailTemplate.subject: Mexico Summer Build - Fly down with a staff member!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi everyone,
For those of you who have been inquiring as well as would like to have peace of mind. We have booked our flight for our Live Different staff member to fly from Toronto and Vancouver to San Diego for your upcoming trip. If you are interested, feel free to match these flights when booking and our staff member can meet you at the airport and connect with you during your travels. We hope this helps!
WESTJET Flight Number WS 703 CONFIRMED Tuesday, 01 August
Departure: YYZ TORONTO ON, CANADA 8:20AM TERMINAL 3 Arrival: YVR VANCOUVER BC, CANADA 10:25AM MAIN TERMINAL
WESTJET Flight Number WS 1762 CONFIRMED Tuesday, 01 August
Departure: YVR VANCOUVER BC, CANADA 12:15PM MAIN TERMINAL Arrival: SAN SAN DIEGO, CA 3:06PM TERMINAL 2
WESTJET Flight Number WS 1763 CONFIRMED Thursday, 10 August
Departure: SAN SAN DIEGO, CA 3:55PM TERMINAL 2 Arrival: YVR VANCOUVER BC, CANADA 6:51PM MAIN TERMINAL
WESTJET Flight Number WS 724 CONFIRMED Thursday, 10 August - Friday, 11 August
Departure: YVR VANCOUVER BC, CANADA 10:45PM MAIN TERMINAL Arrival: YYZ TORONTO ON, CANADA 6:14AM +1 day TERMINAL 3
